thread.title: Silke de Gobeo
thread.title_full: Choosetexaspower reviewed by Silke de Gobeo

author: Silke de Gobeo
title: Silke de Gobeo
text: I never used this service and first started chatting with a customer representative. Throughout the chat conversation, they realized that it might be better for me to call. I was given a priority number and when I called I was connected to Lukas who right away reviewed the notes from the chat. It was nice to have a seamless conversation from chat to a person. After a couple of minutes, he was able to find me a perfect plan, answered all my questions and at the end, I felt great due to the wonderful customer service process. I can not remember writing such positive things in a review in a long time. Good job. Now we need to wait and see if the electricity company I choose will do the same.
